page.title: 20St.George's Hill- Houses
page.content:
Most of the houses on St.George's Hill are large and have swimming pools and tennis courts. All houses must have at least an acre of garden. Prices of the houses vary considerably, depending on the age of the house, size and number of rooms.Here are some advertisements from our local paper:-
Fine residence in secluded 2 acre grounds overlooking golf course Â£297,500.
Character residence with new sports complex in approx. 1 acre, 6 bedrooms, 3 reception rooms, modern kitchen, Double garage Â£320,000
Superb character house in idylic situation,5 bedrooms, 3 receptions, modern kitchen and bathroom, approx 3 acres private ground Â£135,000
